comments:

I'm sure this is related to #46624.
Moving to SWT.

Veronika,

It seems that Clipboard.dispose() is called multiple times. I am not sure why this happens, but we 
should not throw an exception. Just check if it has been disposed already. We allow dispose() to be 
called multiple times everywhere else (graphics and widgets).

Silenio
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 46707 ***
